name: Libvirt Service
description: Ensures the libvirtd virtualization daemon is active.
check_cmd: if command -v virsh >/dev/null 2>&1; then if systemctl is-active libvirtd >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo ok; else echo fix; fi; else echo ok; fi
fix_cmd: if command -v systemctl >/dev/null 2>&1; then systemctl restart libvirtd || true; fi
verify_cmd: if systemctl is-active libvirtd >/dev/null 2>&1; then echo ok; else echo fail; fi
